results.title: Our biology working against us in obesity: A narrative review on implications for management of osteoarthritis
results.text_hl: We propose a combined approach of @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ when indicated, together with targeting @DISEASE_Larva_Migrans @DISEASE_MESH:D007815 @@@weight creep@@@ across adult years and the potential role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Implementing these combined approaches is likely to be more effective in improving @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ related outcomes, reducing @<m>DISEASE_Joint_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007592 @@@joint damage@@@ and healthcare costs, than our current focus on achieving @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ in @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@.

citations.NLM: Cicuttini FM, Proietto J, Lim YZ. Our biology working against us in obesity: A narrative review on implications for management of osteoarthritis Osteoarthr Cartil Open. 2023 Dec;5(4):100407. PMID: 37744021

results.title: Protective effects of metformin against osteoarthritis through upregulation of SIRT3-mediated PINK1/Parkin-dependent mitophagy in primary chondrocytes.
results.text_hl: Overall, our findings provide evidence that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppresses @GENE_IL1B @GENE_3553 @@@IL-1beta@@@-induced oxidative and @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@-like @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ changes by enhancing the @GENE_SIRT3 @GENE_64384 @@@SIRT3@@@/@GENE_PINK1 @GENE_68943 @@@PINK1@@@/Parkin signaling pathway, thereby indicating @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential in prevention and treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Joint_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007592 @@@osteoarthritic joint disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang C, Yang Y, Zhang Y, Liu J, Yao Z, Zhang C. Protective effects of metformin against osteoarthritis through upregulation of SIRT3-mediated PINK1/Parkin-dependent mitophagy in primary chondrocytes. Biosci Trends. 2019 Jan 22;12(6):605-612. PMID: 30584213

results.title: Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS.
results.text_hl: Its off-label use is still controversial with unknown mechanisms due to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ risk versus benefit hypothesis by practitioners as they successfully treat @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ in adolescents with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. But in few reported cases @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has potential to induce @DISEASE_Back_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D001416 @@@back pain@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Joint_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007592 @@@swollen joints@@@ less frequently with rare cases of behavior alteration.

citations.NLM: Ayub M, Gul S, Zehra F. Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS. Pak J Pharm Sci. 2019 May;32(3):1107-1110. PMID: 31278727
